response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This remarkable item holds immense value to us, but its worth to you is equally significant. We are offering it to you at a special price of $950,000, which we believe strikes a balance between our valuation and your perceived worth. This is an exceptional chance to secure a high-quality asset at a premium yet reasonable rate. We look forward to your consideration.", "product_price": 950000}
